sentence: "If Madison Cawthorn were ten years old and seeking to be on the ballot in North Carolina, there'd be no question that he's ineligible to be placed on the ballot because he doesn't meet the age qualification for a member of Congress.
title: Cawthorn Facing Ballot Removal for Role in Insurrection (So May Trump, Others): 'BradCast' 2/1/2022
